summary: Frontend testing of Employee Leave Detail modal feature. All 13 requested features tested and verified working correctly.

issues: Console warning: 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0' - This appears during chart transitions but doesn't affect functionality

attendance_page_loads_with_employee_data.description: Attendance page loads with employee table showing attendance records

chart_icon_visible_on_employee_rows.description: BarChart3 icon visible on left side of each employee row (data-testid='view-leave-btn-{index}')

clicking_chart_icon_opens_modal.description: Clicking chart icon opens Employee Leave Detail modal (data-testid='employee-leave-detail-modal')

modal_shows_employee_header.description: Modal header shows employee name (Adhitya Charan), ID (EMP0001), department (Research Unit), designation (Software Engineer)

month_navigation_previous.description: Previous month button works - navigates from February 2026 to January 2026

month_navigation_next.description: Next month button works - navigates back to February 2026

kpi_summary_cards_display.description: 5 KPI cards displayed: Total Leaves Taken (4), Remaining Leaves (8), Approved This Month (4), Pending Requests (4), LOP Days (5)

view_toggle_month_view.description: Month view shows 'Monthly Attendance Overview' bar chart with color-coded bars for each day (1-28)

view_toggle_week_view.description: Week view shows 'Weekly Summary' grouped bar chart with Week 1-4 data and legend (LOP, Leave, Present, Week Off)

view_toggle_day_view.description: Day view shows 'Daily Calendar View' with color-coded tiles showing status labels (Week O, LOP, Early, Logged, Emerg, Sick, No Rec, Preplan)

leave_history_log_table.description: Leave History Log table displays 11 leave records with Date, Leave Type, Duration, Reason, Status, Approved By columns

leave_type_filter_dropdown.description: Leave Type filter dropdown works - can select 'Sick Leave' and other types (All Types, Sick, Emergency, Preplanned, Casual, Paid, Unpaid)

modal_close_button.description: Close button (X) successfully closes the modal

critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Console warning about chart dimensions during modal animation - non-blocking but could be improved by adding minWidth/minHeight to ResponsiveContainer
seed_data_creation: None - used existing data (73 attendance records, multiple leave records from January 2026)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Employee Leave Detail modal fully functional. Chart icon on Attendance page rows opens modal with employee header, month navigation, 5 KPI cards, 3-view visualization (Day/Week/Month), and Leave History Log table. All data fetched from existing backend APIs (/api/attendance, /api/leaves, /api/employees). Recharts library used for visualization.
